Опис функцій

◆ luckycount()

int luckycount ( int  number)

This function determines whether a given ticket is lucky or not.

The procedure is as follows:

  • A loop is created that will process the number bit by bit as long as it exists.
  • Each digit of the number is counted separately and converted into units.
  • The sum of the first three and last three digits is calculated.
  • If sum1 and sum2 are the same, this ticket is lucky!
  • After all iterations, the value * lucky * is returned, which can be 0 or 1.
    Аргументи
    [in]numberThe first argument is written to this parameter.

◆ main()

int main ( )

This is a normal int main, which specifies a six-digit number, and the second six-digit number is generated by a pseudo-random number generator, after which a function is called to determine whether the ticket is lucky or not.
